title: Agricultural Datasets
text: agData: R package containing various agricultural data sets

title: Agricultural Datasets
text: FAO Food Agriculture Organization United Nations fao.org/faostat/ STATCAN Statistics Canada statcan.gc.ca/ USDA United States Department Agriculture usda.gov/ ISAAA International Service Acquisition Agri-biotech Applications isaaa.org/

title: Agricultural Datasets
code: # Prep data xx <- data.frame(   Color = factor(agData_Colors, levels = agData_Colors),   Number = 1:length(agData_Colors),   Row = rep(1:10, each = 10, length.out = length(agData_Colors)),   Col = rep(1:10, times = 10, length.out = length(agData_Colors)) ) # Plot mp <- ggplot(xx, aes(x = Row, y = Col)) +   geom_tile(aes(fill = Color)) +   geom_label(aes(label = paste(Number, Color, sep = " - "))) +   scale_fill_manual(values = agData_Colors) +   scale_y_reverse() +   theme_void() +   theme(legend.position = "none") ggsave("man/figures/agData_Colors.png", mp, width = 9, height = 9)

title: Long Term Maize Selection — agData_LongTermMaize
text: dataset Long Term Maize Selection Experiment. NOTES: file contains years, generation numbers, ear numbers (1897-1921 ear numbers indicate row (first two digits) ear within row (last 3 digits); years ears numbered without row designation), individual ear data generation strain long-term selection experiment oil protein University Illinois.  Data strains selected protein (IHP, etc.) percent protein dry weight basis. Data strains selected oil (IHO, etc.) percent oil dry weight basis. Abbreviations used GEN=overall generation, IHP=Illinois high protein, ILP=Illinois low protein, IRHP=Illinois reverse high protein, IRLP=Illinois reverse low protein, IRLP2=Illinois reverse low protein 2, IHO=Illinois high oil, ILO=Illinois low oil, IRHO=Illinois reverse high oil, IRLO=Illinois reverse low oil, ISHO=Illinois switchback high oil.  Columns headed INIHP, INILP, etc. indicate whether ear selected parent next generation. selected ear value 1, non-selected ear value 0.

title: fill_NA — fill_NA
text: function replaces NA values nearest value.

title: fill_NA — fill_NA
text: Vector NA values replaced nearest value

title: fill_NA — fill_NA
code: xx %>% mutate(Column1 = fill_NA(Column1)) #> Error in mutate(., Column1 = fill_NA(Column1)): object 'xx' not found

title: folder_Renamer — folder_Renamer
text: function copies files input folder output folder renames based folder name.

title: folder_Renamer — folder_Renamer
text: input Input folder output Output folder pad.width Minimum width padded number start.num Starting number

title: folder_Renamer — folder_Renamer
code: renameByFolder(input = "J:/PhotoR/input",                output = "J:/PhotoR/output",                pad.width =3 , start.num = 1) #> Error in renameByFolder(input = "J:/PhotoR/input", output = "J:/PhotoR/output",     pad.width = 3, start.num = 1): could not find function "renameByFolder"

title: movingAverage. — movingAverage
text: x vector n number samples centered FALSE, average current sample previous (n-1) samples. TRUE, average symmetrically past future. (n even, use one sample future.) colnames changed

title: region_Info — region_Info
text: Adds region information agData datasets. Uses agData_FAO_Country_Table agData_FAO_Region_Table.

title: region_Info — region_Info
code: xx <- agData_FAO_Crops %>% addRegionInfo() #> Error in addRegionInfo(.): could not find function "addRegionInfo"

title: theme_agData2. — theme_agData
